import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent { products:Array=[ {id:1,name:"Computer",price:1200,checked:false}, {id:2,name:"Printer",price:100,checked:true}, {id:3,name:"Phone",price:200,checked:false}, ]; handleCheckProduct(product:any){ product.checked = product.checked; } }
id Name Price Checked
{{product.id}} {{product.name}} {{product.price}} >
